meanings.definition: To make a choice or decision
meanings.sent1: She opts to eat pizza for dinner.
meanings.sent2: He always opts for the window seat on the plane.
meanings.sent3: The cat opts to nap in the sun rather than play.
meanings.sent4: The tree opts to sway gracefully in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The student opts to study late into the night for the exam.

meanings.sent1: He opts to wear a blue shirt today.
meanings.sent2: She opts to walk to work instead of taking the bus.
meanings.sent3: The dog opts to chase its tail for entertainment.
meanings.sent4: The river opts to flow gently towards the sea.
meanings.sent5: The child opts to share his toys with his friends.
